channel.title: An idea, need help
channel.description:
I have reccently brought a counder strike source server, i was wondering, is there any chance i could link my RSPS run.bat to it? Say for example if the ip was
89.678.89.56/pserver/"all files here"
How would i place that in my servers run.bat Is it possible?
Rich' don't lock this as it is to do with RSPS, i want to know how to run my server from a listen server basically...

item.title: An idea, need help

item.description:
@johno2 wrote:

lesterknome:

Edit: Sorry didnt understand

When you use youe run.bat, it has a dictionary so it noes where all your files are!
Im wondering, is it able to change that dictionary so it runs from a dedicated server (But when i don’t have REAL access, just FTP
